title: contact group error
body:
### expected behaviour
should be possible to add contact groups without error
should be possible to use contact groups without error

### actual behaviour
contacts are not working as should, selecting and adding groups are not working well

### steps to reproduce
1. open new contact
2. add field group
3. select group
4. save
5. add new contact
6. add field group
7. select group, not all groups availabele anymore

1. add group
2. not all groups available anymore
3. error when doing rescan: error setting checksum

### server configuration
operating system:ubuntu 12

web server: apache

database: mysql

php version: php5

owncloud version: 4.5.7

### client configuration
browser: firefox, chrome, ie

operating system: windows

### logs
#### web server error log

no log in webserver error.log

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
log in owncloud.log:
{"app":"contacts","message":"oc_contacts_app::oc_contacts_app::scancategories, scanning: 10 starting from 0","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"core","message":"oc_vcategories::save: array\n(\n)\n","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"contacts","message":"oc_contacts_app::oc_contacts_app::scancategories, scanning: 10 starting from 0","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"core","message":"oc_vcategories::save: array\n(\n)\n","level":0,"time":1361379958}

#### browser log
```
do not know how
